title: Lol Patcher Launch button does nothing
body:
whenever i press the launch button it plays the sound then nothing happens have left it for 10+min thinking maybe my PC is just slow finding the files because i have not played in months

Things i have tried...
1. Running as admin
2. fixing and defraging my Registry
3. repairing the client using the repair button
4. backing up then uninstalling the game, followed by copying the files back in after reinstalling the base client.
5. completely uninstalling, cleaning registry, and doing a clean reinstall from scratch (not using the backup)

anyone have any ideas?

replies.body:
This usually happens if your computer is having a hard time reaching out servers. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should assist you in resolving this because it goes over the most common network misconfigurations that cause a poor connection to happen.

Let me know if you continue to have these issues after working through that guide.
